newsitem.title: USA: Gibson CFO resigns after month on the job.
newsitem.headline: Gibson CFO resigns after month on the job.

text.p: Gibson Greetings Inc said Wednesday that Chief Financial Officer Tommie Smith has resigned for personal reasons.
The resignation, which is effective immediately, comes about a month after Smith was named to the post. The company said it has begun searching for a successor.

"We are disappointed with Tommie Smith's decision, but we are determined to pursue our entertainment company strategy with the same vigor as before," Chairman, President and Chief Executive Frank O'Connell said in a statement. "This resignation will not impede our progress."
Prior to joining Gibson, Smith was chief financial officer of Freer/SkyBox International Inc, a division of Marvel Entertainment Group Inc.
Gibson is a greeting card company.
